Title: Tie Goes to the Runner
Writer: Brian Koppelman (created by), David Levien (created by), Andrew Ross Sorkin (created by), Brian Koppelman, David Levien, Alice O'Neill (story editor), Randall Green (story editor), Wes Taylor (story editor)
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Damian Lewis, Maggie Siff, Malin Akerman
Plot: Chuck receives a mandate from a new boss. Axe braves a hard choice following his recent indictment. Taylor generates a monster strategy. Lara threatens to pull her money from Axe Capital. Sacker strives to prove herself as Chief of Crim
